subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The 49ers secured an automatic bid to the N.C.A.A. tournament, but not before the coach put his visiting father in the hospital and the players went out and conquered their demons.
snippet: The 49ers secured an automatic bid to the N.C.A.A. tournament, but not before the coach put his visiting father in the hospital and the players went out and conquered their demons.
